name: Explore Cambrian Coast Day Ranger
description:
EXPLORE CAMBRIAN COAST DAY RANGER Unlimited travel for one day with weekday time restrictions on the lines from Machynlleth to Aberystwyth and from Machynlleth to Pwllheli. It allows you to visit four of the Welsh narrow gauge railways: the Vale of Rheidol Railway at Aberystwyth, the Talyllyn Railway at Tywyn, the Fairbourne Railway near Barmouth and 
      the Ffestiniog Railway at Minffordd. Buy this ticket online from the TfW website
